product_overview: This platform provides a seamless and interactive experience for users to browse, view, and purchase products online. It features detailed product galleries, multiple product card layouts, a comprehensive product details page, and streamlined shopping cart and order management functionalities.
core_goals: Enable users to browse and view products with high-quality images and interactive features like zoom and swipe.
Provide multiple product card presentations optimized for different contexts such as search results and featured listings.
Offer detailed product information on a dedicated page to assist in purchase decisions.
Facilitate smooth shopping cart management and checkout process.
Allow users to review their order history and confirm successful transactions.
Maintain global application state efficiently for a consistent user experience.
key_features: Product Gallery with image display, thumbnails, swipe, and zoom support.
Multiple Product Card components for varied display contexts including search, listing, and featured views.
Detailed Product Details Page integrating gallery and product information.
Shopping Cart page for managing selected items before purchase.
Order Management system including Order History and Order Success confirmation pages.
Global State Management implemented via React Context to handle application-wide data.
user_flow_summary: User visits product listings with product cards displayed in various formats depending on context.
User clicks on a product card to navigate to the Product Details Page, where they can view an image gallery with thumbnails and zoom/swipe capabilities.
User adds desired products to the Shopping Cart from either the product cards or details page.
User navigates to the Cart Page to review selected items and proceeds to checkout.
Upon successful order placement, the user is redirected to the Order Success Page confirming their purchase.
User can access the Orders Page to view their order history and details at any time.
validation_criteria: Product gallery images load correctly with functional swipe and zoom features.
All product card variants render correctly and link appropriately to product details.
Product Details Page displays complete and accurate product information along with gallery functionality.
Shopping Cart updates reflect correct product additions, removals, and quantity changes.
Order Success Page correctly displays order confirmation and details.
Orders Page lists past orders accurately with proper data fetched from state or backend.
Application state management ensures consistent data across components without errors or race conditions.
